alert.note: Alert for McLean; Webster (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 06 at 5:43PM EST until further notice by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Paducah KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky... Green River at Paradise Green River at Calhoun .Recent rainfall in the basin has caused additional rises on the Green River, and at Paradise and Calhoun, the river is now forecast to rise above flood stage tonight or early Monday. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Calhoun. * WHEN...From Monday morning until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:00 PM CST Sunday the stage was 20.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning and continue rising to a crest of 25.6 feet early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 23.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
